Name: Artifact System Drop Framework & Geodes Handler
Author: pepoluan
Description: Overhauls Artifact System & Geodes drops, and allow content modders to patch into the system

Meta:Changelog.0.3.0: Complete rewrite to remove all traces of GPLv3-taint

Meta:Changelog.0.6.0: Total rewrite! Now this is a framework!
Meta:Changelog.0.6.1: Bugfix: don't crash if location not in primary table
